subject: Re: Paranormal Investigation Into 2012 Via Ghost Box EVP Part 2

full_text:
Why do you think hearing a crackly voice saying "Get out" has anything to do with 2012?

Actually, btw, Edison did scientifically examine every filament he tried: he had a theory about it, he developed a test for it, he tried the test and looked at his results.  He showed the test and results were repeatable. 

That's science right there.
